title: Crayfish coast
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Derek Wright and Conon Fraser
brief_description: The isolated crayfishing settlement of Ngawi is at the eastern end of Cook Strait. This film looks at the livelihood of the crayfishermen and their families in the small stark settlement.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Derek Wright and Conon Fraser
